com.github.katjahahn.tools.anomalies

Interface OptionalHeaderScanning


  • public interface OptionalHeaderScanning
    Scans the Optional Header for anomalies.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkEntryPoint(OptionalHeader opt)
      Checks for entry point anomalies.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkFileAlignment(OptionalHeader opt)
      Checks the FileAlignment field for min, max and default values and verifies if it is a power of two.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkImageBase(OptionalHeader opt)
      Checks image base constraints, including default values according to the specification, multiple of 64 K, zero value, too large value
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkLowAlignment(OptionalHeader opt)
      Checks for low alignment mode.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkReservedAndDeprecated(OptionalHeader opt)
      Checks for reserved entries in the windows specific fields, including DLLCharacteristics, LoaderFlags, Win32VersionValue
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkSectionAlignment(OptionalHeader opt)
      Checks the section alignment for constraints, like section alignment being larger than or equal to file alignment.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkSizes(OptionalHeader opt)
      Checks SizeOfImage and SizeOfHeaders for correct alignment and min/max constraints
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> dataDirScan(OptionalHeader opt)
      Scans the data directories for anomalies, including number of entries and reserved entries.
      long headerSizeMin()
      Returns the minimum value for the SizeOfHeader based on the section table offset plus size.
      boolean isDLL() 
      boolean isWinCE() 
      long roundedUpHeaderSize()
      Rounds up the header size minimum to a multiple of FileAlignment.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> scan() 
      java.lang.String scanReport() 
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> standardFieldScan(OptionalHeader opt)
      Scans all standard fields for anomalies.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> windowsFieldScan(OptionalHeader opt)
      Scans all Windows specific fields for anomalies.

        Returns:
        anomaly list

      • headerSizeMin

        long headerSizeMin()
        Returns the minimum value for the SizeOfHeader based on the section table offset plus size. No alignment is taken into account.

        Returns:
        the minimum header size

      • roundedUpHeaderSize

        long roundedUpHeaderSize()
        Rounds up the header size minimum to a multiple of FileAlignment.

        Returns:
        aligned SizeOfHeaders value as it should be

      • isWinCE

        boolean isWinCE()
        Returns:
        true iff the current optional header has the IMAGE_SUBSYSTEM_WINDOWS_CE_GUI subsystem set.

      • isDLL

        boolean isDLL()
        Returns:
        true iff the current coff file header has the IMAGE_FILE_DLL characteristic set
